Pre-Game Insights: The match is a knockout round in the Men's T20 Asia Cup, with the winner advancing to the Super 4 round.
Bangladesh and Sri Lanka have a history of intense rivalry, including the infamous 'Naagin dance' celebrations and on-field arguments in 2018.
Bangladesh's batting has been struggling recently, with the team director expressing concerns about their opening pair and lack of intent.
Sri Lanka's spinners, particularly Wanindu Hasaranga and Maheesh Theekshana, are expected to play key roles in the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the 5th game in Group B of the tournament.
Kusal Mendis and Mahedi Hasan are highlighted as key players to watch for their respective teams.
The pitch is expected to be spin-friendly, potentially favoring Sri Lanka's spinners.
